互いの背中を預け合い、双頭の斧と対峙する。: We leaned against each other's backs, facing off against the two-headed axe.
まだ１日経っていませんよ。まあ、それ以前に月ヶ瀬さんを、\n双頭の斧になど渡せる:
It hasn't even been a day. Well, even before that, Tsukigase-san...
There's no way I could give it to a two-headed axe.
ですです！ 彼女はＬＯＣに所属するんですから！: That's right! She belongs to the LOC!
言っておくが、ちゆるはどこにもやらんぞ？: Just so you know, I'm not going to let you go anywhere.
ふふ。それはここを切り抜けてから、\n改めてお話させていただきましょうか。:
Hehe. That's only after we get through here,
Let's talk again.
それでオケまる～！: That'll be the end of it!
え、ええ……ちょっと気失ってたけど……！\n問題ないわ！:
Y-Yes... I was a little unconscious, but...!
There's no problem!
フルート機、ドロテア機に伝達！ これより敵勢力の足止め及び、\nジュリー機の保護:
Flute, relay to Dorothea! We will now slow down the enemy forces.
We're going to start protecting and retrieving the Julie machine!
かくして各自、散開。俺はまっすぐジュリー機へ向かった。: And so, everyone spread out. I headed straight for the Julie machine.
我々が先に墜落機体を確保するぞ！: We'll get the crash plane first!
フルートは俺を援護して、他にジュリー機に向かおうとする\n敵下っ端に砲口を向けた:
The flute supports me and tries to head for the other Julie machines.
I pointed my cannon at the enemy underlings.
やらせませーん！！: I won't let you do it!!
（どうやら指揮官機はわからないが、少なくとも下っ端の機体は、\nそこまで装甲が厚:
(Looks like we don't know the commander plane, but at least the underlings do
Looks like the armor isn't that thick...!)
火力の点では実弾を使う向こうのほうが上だが、\n演習用でも衝撃は与えられる。:
In terms of firepower, the other side using live ammunition was superior, but...
Even for field exercises, it's shocking.
フルートの援護もあり、俺は無事ジュリー機のもとに到着できた。\n引き続きフルート:
With the support of the flute, I was able to safely arrive at the Julie plane.
The flute continues to attract the other underlings.
よくも仲間を！！: How dare you bring your friends here!!
あくまで邪魔をするつもりなんだ。: I'm just trying to get in the way.
なんて機動力……！ そこらの賊のくせに、この機体性能……！: What mobility...! Even though they're all thieves, this machine's performance...!
各自レベルの高い賊たちであったが、\n指揮官機の動きは抜きんでていた。:
They were each high-level thieves, but...
The commander's machine hadn't moved an inch.
ユーロ・タワー最強格と謳われるドロテアにも\n勝るとも劣らないのではないだろうか:
Even Dorothea, who is said to be the strongest in Euro Tower, can't do it.
Wouldn’t it be better than nothing?
さっきのバトルロイヤルでのダメージが蓄積している今、\nいささかこちらのほうが不:
Now that the damage from the previous battle royale had accumulated,
We're at a disadvantage here...
悪いけど、ここは勝たせてもらうわ。: I'm sorry, but I'll have to win.
わたくしは大丈夫です……！ ただ、機体がもう……動きません。: I'm fine...! It's just, the aircraft...can't move anymore.
ピクシス・マスールのドロテア・カークランド……\n万全のときに戦いたかったわね。:
Dorothea Kirkland of Pixis Masulu...
I wanted to fight when I was in perfect condition.
……すみません、双頭の斧の首領に突破されました。: ...I'm sorry, the leader of the two-headed axe broke through.
お前が無事ならそれでいい、ありがとう。: As long as you're safe, that's fine. Thank you.
すごい距離から、あんな的確に撃つなんて……！\nごめん、フルートももうダメぽよ…:
I can't believe she shot so accurately from such a great distance...!
Sorry, I can't play the flute anymore...
これくらいの距離、当てて当然よ。\nそっちもうちの機体を随分と動けなくしてくれた:
It's only natural to hit this distance.
Looks like you've made our aircraft pretty immobile, too.
お互い様だな……！: Looks like we're on the same page...!
指揮官機が俺とジュリー機の前に、降り立った。: The command plane landed in front of me and Julie.
俺は機体を操作し、敵機に向かっていった。: I operated the machine and headed for the enemy machine.
そう……そんなに落とされたいのね。: I see... So you want to be dropped that badly.
指揮官機が砲口をこちらに向け、狙いを定めて引き金を引こうとする。: The command plane pointed its cannon in our direction, taking aim and trying to pull the trigger.
引き金のタイミングに合わせてレバーを操作、霞光は身を捩って\n射線から離脱し、そ:
Manipulating the lever to match the timing of the trigger, Kasumi’s body twisted
I left the line of fire and avoided the bullets that followed.
ちょっとは驚いてくれたようで、何よりだ！: I’m glad you’re a little surprised!
双頭の斧には他にも下っ端機体がまだ複数残っていた。\n背中から撃たれてしまっては:
There were still multiple other underlings left on the two-headed axe
There's nothing I can do if I get shot in the back.
（ぐ……今ので霞光も、動かなくなったか……）: (Guh...... So that's why Kasumi stopped moving......)
指揮官機が俺の前に立った。: The commander machine stands in front of me.
その操縦技術は称賛に値するわ。\n恐らく学園でも最上位クラスでしょうね。:
Your piloting skills are admirable.
It's probably the highest-ranking class at the academy.
……そりゃどうも。\nちゆるを追わなくていいのか？:
...Thank you very much.
Shouldn't we chase after Chiyuru?
部下に任せてあるわ。それよりもあんたよ。\n正直後々のことを考えると、私には『危:
I've left it to my subordinates. More importantly, you.
Honestly, when I think about the future, I can only think of it as a “risk factor”.
何意味のわからないことを言って……: I don't understand what you're saying...
別にあんたと長々と話す気はない。\n他の子から命を取るつもりはないけど、あんただ:
I have no intention of talking to you for too long.
I don’t intend to take my life from another girl, but you’re a different—
画面いっぱいに砲口が映し出される。: The screen was filled with cannons.
……どうやら、ここまでのようだな。: ...Looks like this is as far as we can go.
だが、いつまで経っても引き金を引かれる様子がない。: But no matter how much time passed, there was no sign of him pulling the trigger.
（手が震えている……これは恐怖？ ためらい？\nいや、違う。これはもっと別の……:
(My hands are shaking... Is this fear? Hesitation?)
No, that's not it. This is something else... something more fundamental...)
今度はこっちの番だ！ やられた分、全部やり返してやるっ！: Now it's my turn! I'll pay you back for everything you've done!
撤退したシリウスシュガーが実戦用装備で戻ってきてくれたのだ。: The retreating Sirius Sugaru had returned in combat gear.
来てくれたのはシリウスシュガーだけではない。\n風紀委員会も一緒だった。:
Sirius Sugaru wasn’t the only one who came.
The disciplinary committee was with them.
風紀委員各機およびシリウスシュガー全機、兵器使用自由！\n１機残らず叩き潰しなさ:
All PMC units and all Sirius Sugar units are free to use weapons!
Crush every last one of them!
